# Cantor's Theorem {#thm-cantor}

For any [set](def-set.qmd) $A$, there is no surjection from $A$ to its [power set](def-power-set.qmd) $\mathcal{P}(A)$. In particular, the [cardinality](def-cardinality.qmd) satisfies $|A| < |\mathcal{P}(A)|$.
